content: teddy cat crochet pattern by ratliff hannah designs ravelry materials chunky orange yarn for body white chunky textured for paws embroidery needle yarn/thread for nose and paws 6 mm hook 5/6 mm safety eyes optional scissors stuffing stitches used single single_crochet slip_stitch slp-st chain chain increase increase decrease decrease bobble stitch bbl *yo pull up a loop pull through 2 loops* do this 4 times 5 loops total on hook yo pull through all 5 loops teddy cat ratli- hannah on ravelry teddy cat body worked in orange starting point is top of head round 1 magic_ring single_crochet 6 6 round 2 increase 6 12 round 3 *single_crochet increase* x6 18 round 4 single_crochet 5 change to your white yarn in that same 5th single_crochet drop the orange continuing with white bbl single_crochet bbl muzzle created change to orange yarn fasten_off white yarn continuing in orange single_crochet 10 to end 18 round 5 *decrease single_crochet* x6 12 if you want safety eyes fasten them into the round above the muzzle stitches about one and a half stitches apart see picture embroidering eyes on later is an option as well completed head rounds 1-5 round 6 single_crochet 12 12 stuff kitten round 7 increase 4 single_crochet increase 4 single_crochet increase 2 16 teddy cat ratli- hannah on ravelry round 8 increase 2 11 single_crochet increase 3 21 stuff kitten round 9 increase 7 single_crochet increase 9 single_crochet increase 3 26 round 10 26 single_crochet 26 round 11 decrease 6 single_crochet decrease 2 single_crochet decrease 8 single_crochet decrease 2 single_crochet 22 round 12 decrease 4 single_crochet decrease 3 single_crochet decrease 3 single_crochet decrease 4 single_crochet 18 round 13 *single_crochet decrease* x6 12 stuff kitten round 14 *single_crochet decrease* x4 8 slp-st finish stuffing kitten fasten_off leaving a long tail use the tail to weave in the blo of each stitch around of round 14 pull tight to close weave in end teddy cat ratli- hannah on ravelry tail worked in orange and white starting point is tail tip begin in white row 1 chain 3 3 row 2 starting in the second chain from hook 2 single_crochet 2 change to your orange yarn as you chain 1 to go to the next row row 3-13 11 row chain 1 2 single_crochet turn 2 fasten_off and weave in the white ends at the tail tip but leave the orange thread long for connecting to the rump back paws worked in white starting point is paw base make 2 round 1 magic_ring single_crochet 6 6 round 2 single_crochet bbl 3 single_crochet 2 6 slp-st in beginning st fasten_off leaving a long tail for later sewing teddy cat ratli- hannah on ravelry back paws worked in white starting point is paw base make 2 round 1 magic_ring single_crochet 6 6 round 2 single_crochet bbl st 3 single_crochet 2 6 round 3 6 single_crochet 6 change to your orange yarn in last single_crochet fasten_off white round 4-5 2 rounds single_crochet 6 6 lightly stuff paws slp-st
